translation.en: [interviewer] Why do you think it's important to tell your story?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que es importante contar tu historia?

translation.en: Well, it's important 'cause my life is on the line,
translation.es: Bueno, porque mi vida está en juego

translation.en: and I want people to know that I'm not… I'm not crazy,
translation.es: y quiero que la gente sepa que no estoy loco,

translation.en: and I'm not a murderer and I'm innocent.
translation.es: que no soy un asesino y que soy inocente.

translation.en: -[Anthony] Hello? -[operator] Sheriff's office. Sheriff's office.
translation.es: - ¿Hola? - Oficina del alguacil.

translation.en: And, what is the emergency?
translation.es: Sí, ¿cuál es la emergencia?

translation.en: [Anthony] I killed my dad.
translation.es: Maté a mi papá.

translation.en: [woman 1] The scariest thing about Anthony is I don't know if he has empathy.
translation.es: Lo más aterrador sobre Anthony es que no sé si tiene empatía.

translation.en: I look at him and I don't see any feelings.
translation.es: Lo miro y no veo que tenga sentimientos.

translation.en: He was definitely shooting to kill, there is no doubt about it.
translation.es: Disparó a matar, no hay dudas al respecto.

translation.en: [man 1] I couldn't understand why Anthony would do that.
translation.es: No podía entender por qué Anthony lo haría.

translation.en: Such a quiet, well-behaved young man.
translation.es: Un joven tan tranquilo y educado.

translation.en: The kid got anything he asked for.
translation.es: Siempre tuvo todo lo que quiso.

translation.en: I think he took an opportunity, and he did something about it.
translation.es: Creo que vio la oportunidad y la aprovechó.

translation.en: [woman 2] I don't feel like he's guilty.
translation.es: No siento que sea culpable.

translation.en: I feel like he was pushed to that point, and he was young and he broke.
translation.es: Creo que lo llevaron a hacerlo. Era joven y colapsó.

translation.en: His father pleaded with Anthony, "Don't shoot me anymore."
translation.es: Su padre le rogó: "No me dispares más".

translation.en: And Anthony shoots him two more times.
translation.es: Y Anthony le disparó dos veces más.

translation.en: [woman 1] I don't know the truth.
translation.es: No conozco la verdad.

translation.en: Not absolutely every bit of it.
translation.es: No todos los detalles.

translation.en: There is one person on this planet that knows what happened,
translation.es: Solo hay una persona que sabe lo que pasó.

translation.en: and nobody else does.
translation.es: Nadie más.

translation.en: [operator] 911, where is your emergency?
translation.es: 911, ¿cuál es su emergencia?

translation.en: I just uh… killed my dad.
translation.es: Acabo de matar a mi papá.

translation.en: What do I need to tell you?
translation.es: ¿Qué debo decirte?

translation.en: So you said you just killed your dad?
translation.es: ¿Dijo que mataste a su papá?

translation.en: [Anthony] Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: [operator] Okay, and um… Is he… Is he still alive, or…?
translation.es: Bien, ¿y sigue con vida o…?

translation.en: [Anthony] He might be. I don't know. I shot him like three times, I think.
translation.es: Puede ser. No lo sé. Le disparé tres veces, creo.

translation.en: -[operator] You shot him three times? -[Anthony] I'm not sure.
translation.es: - ¿Le disparó tres veces? - No sé cuántas le di. Hay sangre en el piso, así que al menos una le pegó.

translation.en: There's blood on the floor, so I know he's been shot once.
translation.es: Hay sangre en el piso, así que al menos una le pegó.

translation.en: -I shot three times at him. -[operator] Okay…
translation.es: - Bien. - Le disparé tres veces.

translation.en: [Anthony] He's on the ground.
translation.es: Está en el suelo.

translation.en: [operator] All right, and what's your name?
translation.es: Bien, ¿y cómo se llama?

translation.en: [Anthony] Anthony Joseph Templet.
translation.es: Anthony Joseph Templet.

translation.en: [woman] I'm an assistant district attorney and I'm the chief of litigation here.
translation.es: Soy asistente del fiscal de distrito y la jefa del departamento de litigios.

translation.en: The first time that I heard about Anthony Templet,
translation.es: Lo primero que supe sobre Anthony Templet

translation.en: it came across my phone because we'd get emails all the time
translation.es: lo vi en mi teléfono, porque nos llegan correos todo el tiempo

translation.en: when there's… there's a homicide.
translation.es: cuando hay un homicidio.

translation.en: I just remember thinking "Oh, that's sad.
translation.es: Recuerdo que pensé: "Qué triste".

translation.en: You know, it's just, any time, you know, a son kills a father
translation.es: Cada vez que un hijo mata a su padre

translation.en: it's something very unusual and it's a sad thing.
translation.es: es algo muy inusual y triste.

translation.en: And listening to the 911 call was disturbing.
translation.es: Escuchar la llamada al 911 fue muy fuerte.

translation.en: And I thought, "Hm…"
translation.es: Recuerdo que pensé:

translation.en: "Gosh. That-- His affect is so flat."
translation.es: "Dios, cuánta frialdad".

translation.en: [Anthony] I hear sirens.
translation.es: Oigo las sirenas.

translation.en: [operator] You hear the deputies coming?
translation.es: ¿Oye a los oficiales?

translation.en: [Anthony] Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: [man 2] This was the first time I've come to this neighborhood for a major incident.
translation.es: Fue la primera vez que iba ahí por un incidente grave.

translation.en: There's some places that you don't expect to get phone calls or dispatches of that type.
translation.es: Hay sitios de donde no se esperan ese tipo de llamadas.

translation.en: And this was… is one of those neighborhoods.
translation.es: Y este era uno de esos vecindarios.

translation.en: [operator] He's waiting outside. What color are you waiting in?
translation.es: Está esperando afuera. ¿De qué color está vestido?

translation.en: [Anthony] I'm outside. I'm in blue gym shorts and a gray shirt.
translation.es: Estoy afuera. Tengo un short azul y una camiseta gris.

translation.en: [William] Dispatch told us that the subject said that
translation.es: La central nos avisó que el sujeto dijo que el arma estaba dentro de la casa,

translation.en: the firearm was inside the residence, but you don't take that for granted.
translation.es: La central nos avisó que el sujeto dijo que el arma estaba dentro de la casa, pero no hay que confiarse.

translation.en: You're always going to get out with the precautions that that person is armed.
translation.es: Siempre hay que tomar las precauciones como si la persona estuviera armada.

translation.en: [operator] Where exactly are you waiting?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está esperando?

translation.en: [Anthony] By the road, by the mailboxes.
translation.es: En la calle, junto al buzón.

translation.en: [William] Hands in the air!
translation.es: ¡Arriba las manos!

translation.en: He was very compliant.
translation.es: Fue muy dócil.

translation.en: He did exactly what he was told to do.
translation.es: Hizo exactamente lo que le dijimos.

translation.en: He wasn't crying.
translation.es: No estaba llorando.

translation.en: Almost no emotions.
translation.es: No mostraba ninguna emoción.

translation.en: For the type of dispatch, yeah, that is odd.
translation.es: Para el tipo de incidente, sí, fue muy extraño.

translation.en: [Anthony] I didn't understand what was going on.
translation.es: No entendía lo que pasaba.

translation.en: I thought they needed to cuff me for a second, so that they could figure out what was going on
translation.es: Pensé que me esposarían un rato para ver qué estaba pasando

translation.en: and then they'd let me go, but it didn't go that way.
translation.es: y que luego me dejarían ir, pero no fue así.

translation.en: [William] We went down the driveway through the carport in the back door,
translation.es: Fuimos por la cochera hacia la puerta de atrás,

translation.en: which led into the kitchen.
translation.es: que daba a la cocina.

translation.en: I saw one revolver laying on the kitchen island with the hammer cocked back,
translation.es: Vi un revólver en la isla de la cocina con el martillo jalado hacia atrás,

translation.en: and the barrel was facing the entryway into the kitchen.
translation.es: y el cañón apuntaba hacia la entrada.

translation.en: We made it through the kitchen, making sure that nobody else was in the house.
translation.es: Entramos para asegurarnos de que no hubiera nadie más en la casa.

translation.en: When I get into the master bedroom…
translation.es: En la habitación principal,

translation.en: …located another firearm,
translation.es: encontré otra arma…

translation.en: laying on the bed with the hammer back on it.
translation.es: sobre la cama con el martillo jalado hacia atrás.

translation.en: And it was laying next to a cell phone.
translation.es: Y estaba junto a un celular.

translation.en: We saw the victim laying there in the hallway.
translation.es: Vimos a la víctima tirada en el pasillo.

translation.en: He was laying there in a puddle of blood, still breathing.
translation.es: Estaba sobre un charco de sangre y aún respiraba.

translation.en: EMS paramedics arrived on the scene.
translation.es: Los paramédicos llegaron a la escena.

translation.en: They immediately move the victim out of the bathroom area.
translation.es: Sacaron a la víctima del baño.

translation.en: And they loaded him up and left to the hospital.
translation.es: La subieron y se fueron al hospital.

translation.en: Have a seat right there for me, please.
translation.es: Siéntate ahí, por favor. VIDEO DE LA POLICÍA

translation.en: [Anthony] I didn't know how the system worked.
translation.es: No sabía cómo era el sistema.

translation.en: So I figured, "Okay… I'm gonna have to spend a little bit--" "A couple days in jail."
translation.es: Así que pensé: "Bueno, estaré unos días en la cárcel".

translation.en: But they took me down to, like, a holding cell, and started interrogating me.
translation.es: Pero me llevaron a una celda y comenzaron a interrogarme.

translation.en: When Anthony first arrived at the Violent Crime unit,
translation.es: Cuando Anthony llegó a la unidad de Crímenes Violentos,

translation.en: he was really calm, he was quiet.
translation.es: estaba muy tranquilo.

translation.en: And I informed him that I was the investigator, here to talk to him.
translation.es: Le informé que yo era el investigador y que venía a hablar con él.

translation.en: Asked him would he feel like talking about what happened?
translation.es: Le pregunté si quería contarme lo que había pasado.

translation.en: He said, "Yes."
translation.es: Me dijo que sí.

translation.en: Let's start off by um… talking about who live at your house.
translation.es: Empieza contándome quién vive en tu casa.

translation.en: Okay, so there's just me and my dad that live there.
translation.es: Bueno, solo vivimos mi papá y yo.

translation.en: And explain y'all's relationship.
translation.es: Explícame cómo es su relación.

translation.en: Well, it's very off and on. We've… We have trouble getting along. And um…
translation.es: No es constante. Nos cuesta llevarnos bien. Y…

translation.en: Yeah, I don't really like him.
translation.es: Sí, no lo quiero.

translation.en: -You don't? -No.
translation.es: - ¿No? - No.

translation.en: Could you tell me why?
translation.es: ¿Podrías decirme por qué?

translation.en: Well, I don't know. He just holds things over your head.
translation.es: Bueno, no lo sé. Se le meten cosas raras en la cabeza.

translation.en: [Greg] He said his father would insult him,
translation.es: Dijo que su padre lo insultaba,

translation.en: call him bad names like a dickhead, or an asshole.
translation.es: que le decía que era un estúpido o un imbécil.

translation.en: But that was nothing
translation.es: Pero eso no era nada

translation.en: that would supersede the homicide of his father.
translation.es: que justificara el homicidio de su padre.

translation.en: [Greg] Let's talk about yesterday.
translation.es: Hablemos de lo que pasó ayer.

translation.en: It was pretty normal. Had dinner. It was all good.
translation.es: Fue un día normal. Cenamos. Todo estaba bien.

translation.en: And I went to sleep.
translation.es: Y me fui a dormir.

translation.en: And he started looking through my phone in the middle of the night,
translation.es: Y comenzó a revisar mi teléfono en medio de la noche.

translation.en: and I was like, you know, "Why are you looking through my phone?"
translation.es: Le pregunté: "¿Por qué me revisas el teléfono?

translation.en: So, like, "What the heck?" And we got into a big argument.
translation.es: ¿Qué carajo?". Y discutimos fuerte.

translation.en: He was accusing me of calling-- Having calls with uh… my stepmother.
translation.es: Me acusaba de llamar… De haber llamado a mi madrastra.

translation.en: [Greg] Well, why wouldn't he want you to even talk to your stepmom?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no querría que hablaras con tu madrastra?

translation.en: Oh, he's in a… I guess they're in a fight or something.
translation.es: Supongo que están peleados o algo así.

translation.en: And he doesn't like secrets.
translation.es: Y no le gustan los secretos.

translation.en: [Anthony] Susan and Burt had separated for six months before.
translation.es: Susan y Burt se habían separado seis meses antes.

translation.en: I was left alone in the house with him.
translation.es: Me quedé solo en la casa con él.

translation.en: He wanted to talk to her really bad, and I guess he just didn't want to feel left out, I guess.
translation.es: Él tenía muchas ganas de hablar con ella, y supongo que no quería sentirse excluido.

translation.en: He couldn't find nothing on my phone.
translation.es: No encontró nada en mi teléfono.

translation.en: And then he started just yelling and going off about random stuff.
translation.es: Y luego empezó a gritar y recriminarme lo que fuera.

translation.en: Things went from verbal to physical.
translation.es: Las cosas pasaron de lo verbal a lo físico.

translation.en: Anthony said that Burt was trying to punch him and grab him.
translation.es: Anthony dijo que Burt intentaba golpearlo y agarrarlo.

translation.en: But Anthony pushed him to the side,
translation.es: Pero Anthony lo empujó

translation.en: and managed to run out of his room into Burt's room.
translation.es: y logró salir corriendo de su habitación a la de Burt.

translation.en: [Anthony] I locked the door on him. And he started banging down the door.
translation.es: Me encerré. Comenzó a golpear la puerta.

translation.en: I was scared.
translation.es: Tenía miedo.

translation.en: I was just scared I was going to get hurt.
translation.es: Tenía miedo de que me lastimara.

translation.en: I didn't really know what to think. I'd figured I'd just get some guns to defend myself.
translation.es: No sabía qué pensar. Se me ocurrió agarrar unas armas para defenderme.

translation.en: [Greg] You say, "guns" or "a gun"?
translation.es: ¿Dijiste "armas" o "un arma"?

translation.en: Oh, I grabbed two.
translation.es: Agarré dos.

translation.en: One-- I grabbed two in case one didn't work, because I'd never shot these guns in so long.
translation.es: Agarré dos por si una no funcionaba, porque hacía mucho que no las usaba.

translation.en: When somebody tell you they have a backup firearms,
translation.es: Cuando alguien te dice que tiene un arma extra por las dudas,

translation.en: they basically at the point that they intend to kill you.
translation.es: básicamente, tiene la intención de matar.

translation.en: He had told me about past experiences with him using the firearm,
translation.es: Me contó sobre experiencias pasadas en las que había usado el arma,

translation.en: how it was easy to pull the trigger with the hammer pulled back.
translation.es: lo fácil que era apretar el gatillo con el martillo hacia atrás.

translation.en: Did you warn him? Did you say anything?
translation.es: ¿Lo amenazaste? ¿Le dijiste algo?

translation.en: "Hey." Did you tell him to stop?
translation.es: "Oye…". ¿Le dijiste que se detuviera?

translation.en: Did you say, "Hey, Dad, I got a gun"?
translation.es: ¿Le dijiste: "Papá, tengo un arma"?

translation.en: No-- Oh, he did accuse me.
translation.es: No… Pero sí me acusó.

translation.en: He was like, "You going to shoot me, motherfucker?"
translation.es: Me decía: "¿Me vas a disparar, hijo de puta?".

translation.en: or something, through the door, and I was like…
translation.es: O algo así, a través de la puerta. Y yo…

translation.en: And what did you say?
translation.es: ¿Y qué dijiste?

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.es: Nada.

translation.en: I just kept going-- I just kept getting the guns.
translation.es: Seguí buscando las armas.

translation.en: I felt like this was the worst I've ever seen him,
translation.es: Sentí que nunca lo había visto peor

translation.en: and I didn't see any other way that this was going to get resolved.
translation.es: y que no había otra forma de resolverlo.

translation.en: And I felt like my life was really in danger.
translation.es: Sentí que mi vida estaba en peligro.

translation.en: [Greg] Burt apparently was trying to force his way in the room.
translation.es: Al parecer, Burt intentaba entrar a la fuerza.

translation.en: There was evidence of that from the crack on the door.
translation.es: Descubrimos evidencia de eso por unas rajaduras en la puerta.

translation.en: He ended up stunning himself,
translation.es: En un momento se detuvo.

translation.en: and I guess he, like, hit it wrong or something.
translation.es: Creo que se lastimó por un mal golpe.

translation.en: Heard a big grunt, or something like that.
translation.es: Escuché un quejido fuerte o algo parecido.

translation.en: He stopped banging on the door, and…
translation.es: Dejó de golpear la puerta,

translation.en: I opened the door…
translation.es: así que la abrí

translation.en: I ended up shooting him.
translation.es: y terminé disparándole.

translation.en: In your dad's room, is there another door
translation.es: En el cuarto de tu papá, ¿hay otra puerta

translation.en: to get to another part of the house?
translation.es: para salir a otro ambiente?

translation.en: Or is there a window, which you could climb out of?
translation.es: ¿O hay una ventana por la que podrías salir?

translation.en: There's a couple of windows, probably locked.
translation.es: Hay un par de ventanas, probablemente cerradas.

translation.en: But I guess I could've opened them and got out.
translation.es: Podría haberlas abierto y salir.

translation.en: -[Greg] Is there a phone in there? -Yeah, there is.
translation.es: - ¿Hay un teléfono? - Sí.

translation.en: -[Greg] In the room? -There is.
translation.es: - ¿En la habitación? - Sí.

translation.en: [Greg] Anthony had other avenues he could have taken,
translation.es: Anthony podía haber tomado otros caminos,

translation.en: but Anthony clearly stated he wanted to end everything.
translation.es: pero fue claro cuando dijo que quería terminar con todo.

translation.en: [interviewer] Was there a choice when you opened that door?
translation.es: ¿Tenías otra opción al abrir puerta?

translation.en: I felt like I didn't.
translation.es: Sentí que no.

translation.en: [interviewer] How did you feel after it happened?
translation.es: ¿Y qué sentiste después?

translation.en: I mean, I felt terrible, but, you know, I didn't see any other way.
translation.es: Me sentí terrible, pero no vi otra alternativa.

translation.en: [Greg] I don't believe that Anthony was is any danger.
translation.es: No creo que Anthony haya estado peligro.

translation.en: Anthony stated that Burt tried to physically attack him.
translation.es: Anthony dijo que Burt intentó atacarlo físicamente.

translation.en: I did not see any bruising or injuries to Anthony
translation.es: No le vi moretones ni heridas

translation.en: indicative of being involved in a fistic altercation.
translation.es: que indicaran que estuvo involucrado en algún forcejeo físico.

translation.en: Your scene'll tell you a lot of things about an incident.
translation.es: La escena dice muchas cosas sobre un incidente.

translation.en: You talk about a fight or anything like that,
translation.es: Si hubo una pelea o algo así,

translation.en: you could see overturned furniture, items that have fell to the floor.
translation.es: habrá muebles caídos, cosas tiradas en el suelo.

translation.en: The home was very, very clean. Nothing was out of order.
translation.es: La casa estaba muy prolija. No había nada fuera de lugar.

translation.en: There wasn't even a dish in the sink.
translation.es: Ni siquiera un plato en el fregadero.

translation.en: Based on information learned, Anthony's statements,
translation.es: Según la información obtenida, la declaración de Anthony

translation.en: and evidence at the scene, there was probable cause to arrest Anthony.
translation.es: y la evidencia en la escena, había una causa para arrestar a Anthony.

translation.en: He was booked for attempted manslaughter.
translation.es: Fue ingresado por intento de homicidio.

translation.en: I woke up to a homicide call on June third
translation.es: Me llamaron de homicidios el 3 de junio

translation.en: that my husband was in trauma neurocritical care at Our Lady of the Lake.
translation.es: y me dijeron que mi esposo estaba internado en terapia intensiva.

translation.en: I went up to the hospital.
translation.es: Fui al hospital.

translation.en: He's on a ventilator.
translation.es: Estaba conectado a un respirador.

translation.en: Machines out of every hole.
translation.es: Una máquina conectada en cada agujero.

translation.en: I held his lifeless hand,
translation.es: Tomé su mano sin vida,

translation.en: and I told him I was so sorry, that I loved him.
translation.es: le dije que lo sentía mucho y que lo amaba.

translation.en: No matter what, I loved him.
translation.es: Lo amaba a pesar de todo.

translation.en: He was four days in the hospital.
translation.es: Estuvo cuatro días en el hospital.

translation.en: And I turned the ventilator off on June 6th,
translation.es: Le apagué el respirador el 6 de junio,

translation.en: and he died.
translation.es: y murió.

translation.en: [emotionally] At the hands of his own son.
translation.es: A manos de su propio hijo.

translation.en: [Greg] On June 6, 2019,
translation.es: El 6 de junio de 2019,

translation.en: the East Baton Rouge parish coroner's office contacted me,
translation.es: me llamaron de la morgue de East Baton Rouge

translation.en: informed me that Burt Templet succumbed to his injuries.
translation.es: para informarme que Burt Templet sucumbió a sus lesiones.

translation.en: The fatal wound was the gunshot wound to his head.
translation.es: La herida mortal fue la bala en la cabeza.

translation.en: They removed fragments from his head, and a projectile from his chest.
translation.es: Le quitaron fragmentos de la cabeza y un proyectil del pecho.

translation.en: The pathologist ruled that Burt's death was a homicide.
translation.es: El forense dictaminó que la muerte de Burt fue un homicidio.

translation.en: Therefore, I upgraded the charges to manslaughter.
translation.es: Así que, elevé los cargos a homicidio.

translation.en: [reporter] Investigators upgraded the charges against this Baton Rouge teen.
translation.es: Se elevaron los cargos contra el adolescente de Baton Rouge.

translation.en: He is accused of shooting his father, Burt Templet.
translation.es: Está acusado de dispararle a su padre, Burt Templet.

translation.en: Now, we're told that the father has died from his injuries.
translation.es: Y ahora falleció a causa de sus heridas.

translation.en: That means 17-year-old Anthony Templet will now face manslaughter charges.
translation.es: Eso significa que Anthony Templet, de 17 años, enfrenta cargos por homicidio.

translation.en: Neighbors we spoke with today say that teen's father, Burt Templet,
translation.es: Los vecinos dicen que el padre del joven, Burt Templet,

translation.en: was not well known in the neighborhood.
translation.es: no era muy conocido en el barrio.

translation.en: None of the neighbors wanted to go on camera,
translation.es: Ninguno quiso salir en cámara,

translation.en: but those that we spoke with said hardly anyone actually spent time
translation.es: pero aquellos con los que hablamos dijeron que no pasaban tiempo

translation.en: or regularly talked with Templet.
translation.es: ni hablaban mucho con Templet.

translation.en: When this story fell into my lap, we had the basic information on it,
translation.es: Cuando me llegó esta historia, teníamos la información básica,

translation.en: but we of course wanted to know why.
translation.es: pero queríamos saber por qué.

translation.en: And that was kind of my task at hand,
translation.es: Y esa fue mi tarea:

translation.en: to try and figure out, to put on the news that night, was what happened.
translation.es: intentar averiguar qué pasó para pasarlo en las noticias esa noche.

translation.en: My first involvement in this story was knocking on doors in the neighborhood,
translation.es: Mi primer acercamiento fue ir a tocar las puertas de los vecinos

translation.en: trying to just get the most basic information of who these people were.
translation.es: para tener algo de información básica de quiénes eran estas personas.

translation.en: It's not a large neighborhood. People know each other. Neighbors talk to each other.
translation.es: No es un barrio grande. La gente se conoce. Los vecinos hablan.

translation.en: It's people that you'd have over to watch the game, or have over for dinner or…
translation.es: Son las personas que invitarías a ver el partido o a cenar…

translation.en: It's just your good Southern American families.
translation.es: Son buenas familias del sur de Estados Unidos.

translation.en: They were shaken a bit that this crime had happened right next door to them,
translation.es: Les conmovió un poco que semejante crimen hubiera pasado allí,

translation.en: in a neighborhood that never had anything go on in it,
translation.es: en un barrio en el que nunca había pasado nada,

translation.en: besides maybe a cookout, right?
translation.es: más allá de una barbacoa, ¿no?

translation.en: They said that Burt was kind of that strange figure,
translation.es: Dijeron que Burt era un personaje extraño,

translation.en: if they saw him, would appear drunk.
translation.es: que, si lo veían, parecía estar borracho.

translation.en: [neighbor 1] The thing that bothered me about Burt is he would really boast about
translation.es: Lo que me molestaba de Burt era que fanfarroneaba… ENTREVISTA DE LA FISCALÍA

translation.en: getting drunk and partying.
translation.es: …sobre emborracharse.

translation.en: [neighbor 2] He was definitely odd. He was definitely off.
translation.es: Sin duda era raro. No era normal.

translation.en: I got a phone call from somebody on Gray Moss.
translation.es: Recibí una llamada de alguien en Gray Moss,

translation.en: And they said that Burt had come over there and knocked on the door,
translation.es: que dijo que Burt había ido a golpearle la puerta

translation.en: and was threatening with his wife.
translation.es: y lo estaba amenazando con su esposa.

translation.en: And the husband said, "He was drunk, he'd been drinking, and we told him to stay away from our house and from our property."
translation.es: Y el esposo dijo: "Estaba ebrio, le dijimos que se fuera de nuestra casa".

translation.en: [Austin] No one knew too much about him. No one knew anything about Anthony.
translation.es: Nadie sabía demasiado de él. Nadie sabía nada de Anthony.

translation.en: They couldn't even probably tell you his age.
translation.es: Ni siquiera podían decir su edad.

translation.en: [neighbor 1] I ran into him when I was at Costco.
translation.es: Me lo encontré en Costco.

translation.en: And this was the first time I'd ever met Anthony.
translation.es: Fue la primera vez que hablamos.

translation.en: Anthony was just very withdrawn, you know.
translation.es: Anthony era muy retraído.

translation.en: [neighbor 2] When I was at their house, I didn't see him. Anytime I drove by their house, I didn't see them.
translation.es: Cuando fui a su casa, no lo vi. Cuando pasaba por su casa, no los veía.

translation.en: -[investigator] Visually, you never even… -[neighbor 2] No.
translation.es: Visualmente, ¿nunca… No.

translation.en: [investigator] …met or saw--? -[neighbor 1] Never. -[neighbor 2] No.
translation.es: - …los vieron o conocieron? - Nunca.

translation.en: [Anthony] I didn't talk to anybody for like maybe a week or two.
translation.es: No hablé con nadie durante una o dos semanas.

translation.en: It was a scary time because I didn't know where I was going, what I was going to do, or… anything.
translation.es: Tenía miedo porque no sabía a dónde iría, qué iba a hacer, ni nada.

translation.en: [operator] This is a collect call from…
translation.es: Es una llamada por cobrar de…

translation.en: [Anthony] …Anthony Templet.
translation.es: Anthony Templet.

translation.en: [man] Hey, are you there?
translation.es: Hola, ¿estás ahí?

translation.en: -[Anthony] Yeah. -[man] Hear me?
translation.es: - Sí. - ¿Me oyes?

translation.en: [Anthony] Calls are recorded, Got to watch what I say.
translation.es: Graban las llamadas, cuidado con lo que dices.

translation.en: [man] I know how this works.
translation.es: Sí, sé cómo funciona.

translation.en: [Anthony] My bond has been set to 100,000 now, from 50,000.
translation.es: Mi fianza aumentó de 50 000 a 100 000 ahora.

translation.en: [man] Well, I knew it was gonna go up.
translation.es: Sabíamos que subiría.

translation.en: [Anthony] Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: He called me. And I had a lot of questions about how the hell it happened.
translation.es: Él me llamó. Yo tenía muchas preguntas sobre qué había pasado.

translation.en: Nobody indicated to me that there was ever any problems between Burt and Anthony.
translation.es: Nadie me había dicho que Burt y Anthony tenían problemas.

translation.en: He paid for everything for Anthony.
translation.es: Le pagaba todo a Anthony.

translation.en: In my eyes, he treated him like a king.
translation.es: En mi opinión, lo trataba como a un rey.

translation.en: [Susan] When I first met Burt,
translation.es: Cuando conocí a Burt,

translation.en: I was at a little sports bar watching the LSU game on my birthday.
translation.es: estaba en un bar viendo un partido en mi cumpleaños.

translation.en: Me and my first husband had fallen out,
translation.es: Me había separado de mi primer esposo,

translation.en: and a friend introduced us.
translation.es: y un amigo nos presentó.

translation.en: We both loved to drink some beer, spend the day in the pool, barbecue.
translation.es: A los dos nos encantaba beber cerveza, estar en la piscina, hacer barbacoas.

translation.en: Eventually, I was living with Burt and Anthony, and my son Peyton.
translation.es: Más tarde, acabé viviendo con Burt, Anthony y mi hijo Peyton.

translation.en: Anthony was seven.
translation.es: Anthony tenía siete años.

translation.en: He had a funny personality.
translation.es: Era muy gracioso.

translation.en: He was laugh-y,
translation.es: Era risueño,

translation.en: not a care in the world,
translation.es: no le preocupaba nada.

translation.en: making funny faces, somewhat sarcastic,
translation.es: Vivía haciendo muecas, era algo sarcástico,

translation.en: non-caring, nonchalant.
translation.es: indiferente, despreocupado.

translation.en: We would do things in the kitchen together,
translation.es: Solíamos hacer cosas juntos en la cocina.

translation.en: and it was like you gave him a million dollars.
translation.es: Parecía que le hubieras dado un millón de dólares.

translation.en: 'Cause somebody was doing something with him,
translation.es: Porque alguien estaba haciendo algo con él

translation.en: and not critiquing how he did everything.
translation.es: en vez de criticar cómo hacía todo.

translation.en: Whenever Burt came into our lives,
translation.es: Cada vez que Burt aparecía en nuestras vidas,

translation.en: our relationship was more conservative.
translation.es: nuestra relación era más conservadora.

translation.en: For an example, we didn't joke as openly.
translation.es: Por ejemplo, no bromeamos tan abiertamente.

translation.en: And that is why AJ did not like to come out of his room,
translation.es: Y es por eso que a AJ no le gustaba salir de su cuarto,

translation.en: because then he had to deal with his father.
translation.es: porque debía lidiar con su padre.

translation.en: When he was around his dad, he couldn't be himself.
translation.es: Cuando estaba con su papá, no podía ser él mismo.

translation.en: He wasn't comfortable enough, he was too scared.
translation.es: No estaba cómodo, estaba muy asustado.

translation.en: He always kinda found a way to make me feel like I was doing something wrong.
translation.es: Siempre encontraba la forma de hacerme sentir que hacia algo mal.

translation.en: It made me real-- feel really sad, and I didn't…
translation.es: Me hacía sentir muy triste, y no me…

translation.en: I felt really bad and guilty.
translation.es: Me sentía mal y culpable.

translation.en: [Peyton] Burt, in his own strange way, loved his son.
translation.es: Burt, a su manera extraña, amaba a su hijo.

translation.en: However, AJ despised Burt.
translation.es: Sin embargo, AJ despreciaba a Burt.

translation.en: [Susan] As he evolved, he became really quiet.
translation.es: A medida que crecía, se volvía más reservado.

translation.en: He was mostly to himself.
translation.es: Era muy introvertido.

translation.en: [Michael] Susan'd tell me that she was scared of Anthony.
translation.es: Susan me decía que le tenía miedo a Anthony.

translation.en: She didn't know if he would shoot her, if he'd kill her, if he'd hurt her.
translation.es: No sabía si un día le dispararía, la mataría o la lastimaría.

translation.en: She was afraid of him.
translation.es: Ella le tenía miedo.

translation.en: Anthony has no emotion.
translation.es: Anthony no tiene emociones.

translation.en: And you can never tell whether he's angry or happy.
translation.es: Y nunca se sabe si está enojado o contento.

translation.en: You can never tell anything. It's just a flatline.
translation.es: Es imposible darse cuenta. Es frío.

translation.en: I don't know if he has empathy.
translation.es: No sé si tiene empatía.

translation.en: When I watched the interview the first time, I was like,
translation.es: Cuando vi la entrevista por primera vez, pensé:

translation.en: "Oh, my gosh, there's not a tear shed for his father."
translation.es: "Por Dios, no derramó ni una lágrima por su padre".

translation.en: I shot him once or twice-- It was two times more.
translation.es: Le disparé una o dos veces. Dos veces más.

translation.en: At least I shot the gun three times, but I don't know how many times I hit him. [Greg] Mm-hmm.
translation.es: Al menos le disparé tres veces, pero no sé cuántas veces le pegué.

translation.en: I was just kind of like… you know?
translation.es: Fue como si… ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: Having been in this system for 44 years,
translation.es: Después de trabajar en esto 44 años,

translation.en: you normally see folks that are crying.
translation.es: normalmente se ve gente llorar.

translation.en: You're upset, you're angry.
translation.es: Están molestos, enojados.

translation.en: "Why did he make me do it? This was going on. This is why I did what I did."
translation.es: "¿Por qué me obligó a hacerlo? Las cosas eran así. Lo hice por esto".

translation.en: Just wasn't there, it was flat.
translation.es: Él no. Estaba ahí, sin ninguna emoción.

translation.en: My dad just made me, you know, kind of stop caring about…
translation.es: Mi papá hizo que dejara de preocuparme…

translation.en: about my feelings, and just started to kinda,
translation.es: por mis sentimientos y empezara…

translation.en: I guess, let go of them, I guess.
translation.es: a no darles importancia.

translation.en: I probably felt love for my dad in my younger years, but as I got older,
translation.es: Supongo que cuando era niño quería a mi papá, pero al crecer,

translation.en: it started to go away.
translation.es: ese amor se fue desvaneciendo.

translation.en: I just try to have no feelings.
translation.es: Intento no sentir.

translation.en: I just try not-- I just try to pretend it never even happened,
translation.es: Hago de cuenta de que nunca pasó.

translation.en: and that helps me move on, so…
translation.es: Me ayuda a seguir adelante.

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you want to live having no feelings? Do you want to have feelings?
translation.es: ¿Quieres vivir sin emoción o te gustaría recuperarla?

translation.en: I can have feelings for people. I just choose not to for him.
translation.es: Puedo tener sentimientos por la gente. Elijo no hacerlo por él.

translation.en: There was one thing, kind of struck me as, "Wow, that's very weird."
translation.es: Hubo una cosa que me sorprendió, me pareció muy rara.

translation.en: -[Greg] Anthony, how old are you? -Seventeen.
translation.es: - Anthony, ¿cuántos años tienes? - Diecisiete.

translation.en: -[Greg] You're 17? -Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Tienes 17? - Sí.

translation.en: [Greg] And your date of birth is what?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es tu fecha de nacimiento?

translation.en: It's either September 13th, 2001, or two. I can't remember which one.
translation.es: El 13 de septiembre de 2001 o 2002. No recuerdo cuál.

translation.en: [Greg coughs] And what's your current address?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es tu dirección?

translation.en: -My home address? -[Greg] Yes, sir.
translation.es: - ¿Mi dirección? - Sí.

translation.en: One-seven… 652 Gray Moss Avenue, I think.
translation.es: Avenida Gray Moss 652, creo.

translation.en: Again, can't really remember.
translation.es: No recuerdo bien.

translation.en: [Dana] He doesn't know his own birth date. He doesn't know his address.
translation.es: No sabía su fecha de nacimiento. No sabía su dirección.

translation.en: Who doesn't know their address?
translation.es: ¿Quién no sabe su dirección?

translation.en: I had more questions after the interview than I had answers.
translation.es: Después de la entrevista, tuve más preguntas que respuestas.

translation.en: [man] When people find out that I'm in Louisiana, that I'm an attorney here, a criminal defense attorney… [laughs]
translation.es: Cuando la gente se entera de que soy abogado penal defensor en Luisiana,

translation.en: …I get, "Man, you're always gonna be in business." [chuckles]
translation.es: me dicen: "Jamás te va a faltar trabajo".

translation.en: I mean, there are shootings and murders every week in Baton Rouge.
translation.es: Hay tiroteos y asesinatos todas las semanas en Baton Rouge.

translation.en: Like clockwork.
translation.es: Como un relojito.

translation.en: We have the highest incarceration rate in the country.
translation.es: Tenemos la tasa de encarcelamiento más alta del país.

translation.en: Is that a product of the criminal justice system?
translation.es: ¿Es producto del sistema judicial?

translation.en: Or is that a product of the fact that the people of Louisiana are a little crazy?
translation.es: ¿O es porque la gente de Luisiana está desquiciada?

translation.en: Frankly, I have a history of drinking like a crazy person, and I have been in a hundred bar fights.
translation.es: La verdad, he bebido como loco y estuve en cientos de peleas de bares.

translation.en: Louisianians are survivors.
translation.es: Los luisianos son sobrevivientes.

translation.en: And I think that that's part my personality,
translation.es: Y es parte de mi personalidad,

translation.en: but it's also part of what's ingrained in me about being a Louisiana boy.
translation.es: pero también es lo que llevo arraigado por haber vivido acá.

translation.en: I know how to survive.
translation.es: Sé cómo sobrevivir.

translation.en: I embrace that part of me that is kind of crazy, that is a little out of the box.
translation.es: Acepto mi parte loca, mi lado fuera de lo común.

translation.en: And I can see in my clients that there are good people who made serious mistakes.
translation.es: Y puedo ver en mis clientes que son buena gente que cometió errores.

translation.en: I heard the public story about Anthony's case, what's in the newspaper.
translation.es: Conocía la historia pública del caso de Anthony, la del periódico.

translation.en: But that's it. That's all I've got.
translation.es: Pero es todo lo que sabía.

translation.en: And someone else hooked me up with Susan, Anthony's stepmom.
translation.es: Y alguien me contactó con Susan, la madrastra de Anthony.

translation.en: And I spoke to her and I said, "Look, this is who I am, I'm exceedingly good at this."
translation.es: Hablé con ella y le dije: "Mire, soy tal, soy muy bueno en esto".

translation.en: And I wanted to talk to Anthony. You know, "Is this true?"
translation.es: Y quería hablar con Anthony, saber si era cierto.

translation.en: "Was this really self-defense?"
translation.es: ¿Fue en defensa propia?

translation.en: Is this what really happened, or is this some made-up story, and he killed his dad in cold blood one night?
translation.es: ¿Es verdad o es una historia inventada y sí mató a su padre a sangre fría?

translation.en: I really don't know what's happening, right?
translation.es: La verdad, no sé qué pasó, ¿no?

translation.en: So I went to the jail to talk to Anthony.
translation.es: Así que fui a la cárcel a hablar con Anthony.

translation.en: -[Jarrett] How you doing? -[Anthony] I'm doing pretty good.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo estás? - Bastante bien.

translation.en: [Jarrett] You okay? Okay.
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? Bueno.

translation.en: So essentially, AJ-- Can I call you AJ?
translation.es: Básicamente, AJ… ¿Puedo llamarte AJ?

translation.en: [Anthony] AJ or Anthony, whichever you prefer.
translation.es: Sí, AJ o Anthony, lo que prefieras.

translation.en: -[Jarrett] What do you prefer? -[Anthony] Anthony.
translation.es: ¿Qué prefieres tú? - Anthony, supongo. - Bien.

translation.en: [Jarrett] Okay.
translation.es: - Anthony, supongo. - Bien.

translation.en: It was unbelievably difficult.
translation.es: Fue increíblemente difícil.

translation.en: It was hard to get him to share anything or talk at all.
translation.es: Fue muy difícil hacer que siquiera hablara.

translation.en: At that time, he was really, really bad at communicating his own life,
translation.es: En ese momento, le costaba mucho hablar sobre su vida,

translation.en: or the instance, or whatever.
translation.es: la situación o lo que fuera.

translation.en: It was important to us to know what actually was going on in the house.
translation.es: Para nosotros era importante saber qué pasaba en la casa.

translation.en: So we sent our investigators out
translation.es: Así que enviamos a nuestros investigadores

translation.en: to talk to people that were close or related to Burt Templet.
translation.es: a hablar con la gente cercana o relacionada con Burt Templet.

translation.en: I wanted to talk to his best friend.
translation.es: Quería hablar con su mejor amigo.

translation.en: A best friend, usually you can get kind of like a little bit more information.
translation.es: Un amigo, por lo general, brinda más información.

translation.en: [friend] I was probably about 15 or 16 when I first met Burt.
translation.es: Tenía unos 15 o 16 años cuando conocí a Burt.

translation.en: He was a good friend.
translation.es: Era un buen amigo.

translation.en: He knew everything.
translation.es: Sabía todo.

translation.en: And he always, of course, tried to be the man of the crowd.
translation.es: Y siempre, por supuesto, intentaba ser el chico popular.

translation.en: He told me he worked in plants at times.
translation.es: Decía que trabajaba en plantas industriales.

translation.en: Uh… I really wasn't very clear about what exactly he did.
translation.es: No tenía muy claro qué hacía exactamente.

translation.en: He said he made a lot of money, supposedly.
translation.es: Y que ganaba mucho dinero, supuestamente.

translation.en: He had a lot of nice things, a nice house.
translation.es: Tenía muchas cosas lindas, una linda casa.

translation.en: [Susan] He was a project controls engineer that made $100 an hour.
translation.es: Era un ingeniero de control de proyectos que ganaba $100 la hora.

translation.en: [quavers] He was an excellent provider.
translation.es: Era un excelente proveedor.

translation.en: We had new cars. We had…
translation.es: Teníamos autos nuevos. Teníamos…

translation.en: …a beautiful home.
translation.es: una casa hermosa.

translation.en: We bought a swimming pool. We put it up together. [sniffles]
translation.es: Compré una piscina. La montamos juntos.

translation.en: We would go on trips out the wazoo.
translation.es: Viajábamos cada dos por tres.

translation.en: [James] On the weekends, we'd hang out, and swim and barbecue,
translation.es: Los fines de semana nos metíamos en la piscina, hacíamos barbacoas,

translation.en: and high-fiving, hugging, telling each other,
translation.es: chocamos los cinco, nos abrazábamos, nos decíamos:

translation.en: "I love you, my brother." [quavers] You know?
translation.es: "Te quiero, hermano".

translation.en: AJ was pretty much to himself.
translation.es: AJ era muy introvertido.

translation.en: We hung out in the pool a few times, not much at all.
translation.es: Estuvimos en la piscina un par de veces, pero no mucho.

translation.en: Anthony was real quiet.
translation.es: Era muy callado.

translation.en: Every time I'd go in the house, he'd be on his laptop, on the computer,
translation.es: Cada vez que iba a la casa, estaba en la computadora

translation.en: he would be in there playing his video games.
translation.es: jugando videojuegos.

translation.en: I couldn't understand why Anthony would do that.
translation.es: No podía entender por qué lo había hecho.

translation.en: Such a quiet and well-behaved young man.
translation.es: Era un muchacho muy tranquilo y educado.

translation.en: How could he shoot your own father?
translation.es: ¿Cómo pudo dispararle a su propio padre?

translation.en: Now, they say that you never know what goes behind closed doors.
translation.es: Dicen que nunca se sabe lo que sucede a puertas cerradas.

translation.en: Burt ended up putting cameras up on the house.
translation.es: Burt terminó colocando cámaras en la casa.

translation.en: Like all the entrances, driveways…
translation.es: En todas las puertas, entradas…

translation.en: The entire house is on surveillance cameras, except for the master bedroom.
translation.es: Toda la casa tenía cámaras de seguridad, menos la habitación principal.

translation.en: [Michael] There's eight cameras outside.
translation.es: Hay ocho cámaras afuera.

translation.en: Most people put them up to secure their home.
translation.es: La mayoría las pone para asegurar su casa.

translation.en: [Susan] He wanted to protect us.
translation.es: Quería protegernos.

translation.en: Keep the family safe.
translation.es: Que la familia estuviera segura.

translation.en: I love you so much.
translation.es: Te quiero mucho.

translation.en: Do I think it's unusual for him to have cameras? No.
translation.es: ¿Es raro que tenga cámaras? No.

translation.en: Did he have underlying intent?
translation.es: ¿Tenía otras intenciones?

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.es: Quizá.

translation.en: Anything and everything immediately outside of the house, he saw.
translation.es: Veía todo lo que pasaba fuera de la casa al instante.

translation.en: I didn't like it, but I chose to look past it at the time.
translation.es: No me gustaba, pero decidí ignorarlo en el momento.

translation.en: [woman] Creepy.
translation.es: Qué miedo.

translation.en: That made me think-- That was very creepy to be checking on your child like that.
translation.es: Me pareció muy perturbador vigilar a tu hijo de esa manera.

translation.en: When I met Anthony, I think he was 16.
translation.es: Creo que Anthony tenía 16 cuando lo conocí.

translation.en: Anthony and I worked shoulder to shoulder, most days.
translation.es: Anthony y yo trabajábamos juntos a la par casi todos los días.

translation.en: I felt a little bit like a mom for him,
translation.es: Me sentía como una mamá para él,

translation.en: only because, you know, he didn't seem to have a mother figure there.
translation.es: porque no parecía tener una figura materna en su casa.

translation.en: My boss, Scott, lived in the same subdivision as Burt Templet.
translation.es: Mi jefe, Scott, vivía en la misma manzana que Burt Templet.

translation.en: On June 3rd, Scott called me before work started
translation.es: El 3 de junio, Scott me llamó antes de ir a trabajar

translation.en: and said, "Hey, I just got a phone call from some of the neighbors."
translation.es: y me dijo: "Me acaban de llamar unos vecinos.

translation.en: "There was a shooting at Anthony's house."
translation.es: Hubo disparos en la casa de Anthony".

translation.en: It seemed like, in the news media, it was just a random shooting,
translation.es: En los medios, lo pintaban como un tiroteo más.

translation.en: this privileged white boy just shooting his dad.
translation.es: El niño blanco que le dispara a su padre.

translation.en: But I knew there was more with this story.
translation.es: Pero yo sabía que había algo más detrás.

translation.en: I just wanted his story to be heard.
translation.es: Quería que se escuchara su historia.

translation.en: Burt knew Scott, and so that's how Anthony had gotten a job at the greenhouse.
translation.es: Burt conocía a Scott, por eso Anthony consiguió trabajar en el vivero.

translation.en: [Scott] It started off with his dad
translation.es: Todo empezó con su papá,

translation.en: repeatedly asking me whether I could give his son a job.
translation.es: que me pedía una y otra vez que le diera trabajo a su hijo.

translation.en: I told Burt, "But I don't know your son."
translation.es: Y yo le dije que no conocía a su hijo.

translation.en: "Maybe if we get a chance to meet each other, I can give you an answer."
translation.es: Le dije que, si me reunía con él, quizá podía considerarlo.

translation.en: [Elena] They went out to eat, you know, just to meet Anthony beforehand, to get an idea.
translation.es: Salieron a comer, para conocer a Anthony, ver cómo era.

translation.en: [Scott] And I was trying to get to know Anthony.
translation.es: Yo intentaba conocer a Anthony.

translation.en: I couldn't ask him a question without Burt being the one to answer everything.
translation.es: No podía hacerle una pregunta sin que Burt la respondiera antes.

translation.en: Burt had-- He wanted to be in control the whole time.
translation.es: Burt quería tener el control todo el tiempo.

translation.en: So we put him to work.
translation.es: Así que le di trabajo.

translation.en: My first impressions of Anthony… Uh… [sighs]
translation.es: Mi primera impresión de Anthony…

translation.en: He just seemed--
translation.es: Parecía…

translation.en: It was like he had never been outside of his house,
translation.es: Era como si nunca hubiera salido de su casa.

translation.en: honestly, is what it seemed like.
translation.es: Sinceramente, daba esa sensación.

translation.en: He had never heard of, you know, Tom Hanks or Tom Cruise.
translation.es: No sabía quiénes eran Tom Hanks o Tom Cruise.

translation.en: He did something right, I said, "Hey, up top, Anthony! Up top!"
translation.es: Hizo algo bien y le dije: "¡Choca arriba, Anthony!".

translation.en: He looked at me like, "What does that mean?"
translation.es: Y me miró como: "¿De qué hablas?".

translation.en: And I was like, "You know, give me a high five!" "You know what that is, right?" "No, I don't know what that is."
translation.es: Y yo: "¡Choca los cinco! ¿Sabes lo que es, ¿no?". Y él no sabía.

translation.en: I just thought Anthony had been seriously neglected.
translation.es: Sentí que le faltó mucha atención.

translation.en: He didn't ever meet any of his relatives for the holidays.
translation.es: Nunca veía a sus familiares en las fiestas.

translation.en: He didn't know if he had any grandparents.
translation.es: No sabía si tenía abuelos.

translation.en: He didn't know his mom.
translation.es: No conocía a su mamá.

translation.en: I had asked him, "What is her name?" He didn't know her name.
translation.es: Le pregunté cómo se llamaba. No sabía su nombre.

translation.en: [Scott] I knew he was homeschooled.
translation.es: Sabía que lo educaron en casa.

translation.en: I have employed many homeschooled kids
translation.es: Trabajé con varios chicos educados en casa

translation.en: and often their social abilities are lacking to some degree.
translation.es: y, en general, suelen tener dificultades en lo social.

translation.en: So I thought maybe that was the biggest part of it.
translation.es: Así que pensé que tenía que ver con eso.

translation.en: But the boy just couldn't talk. [chuckles] You know?
translation.es: Pero él no podía ni hablar, ¿me explico?

translation.en: [Elena] I would try to engage him in conversation, and ask him, you know, about where he was in school.
translation.es: Intentaba charlar con él, preguntarle por dónde iba en la escuela,

translation.en: He never could quite tell me what classes he was in though.
translation.es: pero nunca pudo decirme qué materias estaba viendo.

translation.en: I knew, you know, it wasn't right, but it wasn't enough for me to look into.
translation.es: Sabía que algo no estaba bien, pero tampoco tanto como para meterme más.

translation.en: His dad was keeping serious tabs on him with a GPS tracker on his phone.
translation.es: Su padre lo vigilaba con el rastreador de su teléfono.

translation.en: There was a couple of times when Burt called my boss and said,
translation.es: Un par de veces, Burt llamó a mi jefe y le dijo:

translation.en: "Hey, I noticed on Anthony's GPS tracker he hasn't moved in the last 30 minutes."
translation.es: "Veo que el GPS de Anthony no se mueve hace media hora.

translation.en: "What's he doing? What's going on?"
translation.es: ¿Qué está haciendo? ¿Qué pasó?".

translation.en: It would be because he was standing there fertilizing like a set group of pots. It was in one location.
translation.es: Y quizá estaba en un lugar fertilizando varias macetas.

translation.en: That was weird.
translation.es: Eso era raro.

translation.en: After June 3rd, I went back
translation.es: Después del 3 de junio, volví a ver

translation.en: and I looked at Anthony's application a little more closely
translation.es: la solicitud de empleo de Anthony más en detalle

translation.en: and realized that Burt had typed up the application for Anthony.
translation.es: y me di cuenta de que la había completado Burt.

translation.en: I was looking on there to see what it said for education,
translation.es: Fui a ver qué decía en educación,

translation.en: and it said "Kaplan Prep."
translation.es: y decía "Secundaria Kaplan".

translation.en: When I went back and researched Kaplan Prep School, it was actually not a prep school.
translation.es: Cuando me puse a investigarla, vi que no era una escuela secundaria.

translation.en: It was a website to order standardized testing materials.
translation.es: Era un sitio web para comprar exámenes estándar.

translation.en: So he actually never went to-- Was never homeschooled.
translation.es: Nunca fue a… No recibió educación en su casa.

translation.en: That's when I kind of thought, "Okay, maybe something is going on."
translation.es: Ahí fue cuando pensé que había algo más.

translation.en: "This is not just a random shooting. You know, like maybe there's a reason."
translation.es: Que no le disparó porque sí, quizá había alguna razón detrás.

translation.en: The question then also was, "Where is Anthony's mom?"
translation.es: La pregunta también fue: "¿Dónde está la mamá de Anthony?".

translation.en: And that's when I called Shayna Landry.
translation.es: Y entonces, llamé a Shayna Landry.

translation.en: Anthony came into my life by sheer accident.
translation.es: Anthony llegó a mi vida de pura casualidad.

translation.en: My husband called me one day and he said,
translation.es: Mi esposo me llamó un día y me dijo:

translation.en: "Hey, have you heard anything about this kid in the news that shot his father?"
translation.es: "¿Oíste en las noticias sobre el chico que mató a su padre?".

translation.en: And I said, "Well, it seems pretty cut and dry to me."
translation.es: Y agregó: "Creo que está clarísimo.

translation.en: "I read the story and it sounds like snobby, rich kid
translation.es: Leí la noticia y suena como el clásico chico rico

translation.en: that got mad at his dad and shot him."
translation.es: que se enojó con su papá y le disparó".

translation.en: He told me that his coworker knew Anthony's manager,
translation.es: Me dijo que su colega conocía al gerente de Anthony

translation.en: and there was a lot more to the story.
translation.es: y que había mucho más detrás.

translation.en: He suggested that Elena call me
translation.es: Le sugirió a Elena que me llamara

translation.en: because of my background in solving DNA puzzles.
translation.es: por mi experiencia resolviendo misterios sobre ADN.

translation.en: I had a little shock a couple of years ago
translation.es: Tuve un sacudón hace unos años

translation.en: and found out that the man that I originally thought was my father wasn't.
translation.es: al descubrir que el hombre que pensé que era mi padre no lo era.

translation.en: And I did a DNA test
translation.es: Hice una prueba de ADN

translation.en: and found out that my father was someone totally different and he had no idea that I existed.
translation.es: y descubrí que mi padre era otra persona, y no tenía idea de mi existencia.

translation.en: So I continued to help other families find their DNA matches or solve their mysteries.
translation.es: Así que seguí ayudando a otras familias a cotejar sus ADN o resolver misterios.

translation.en: I've located, I guess almost 40 fathers
translation.es: Logré ubicar a casi 40 padres

translation.en: or other family members that show up in people's DNA.
translation.es: u otros familiares que aparecen en el ADN de las personas

translation.en: I called Shayna… [inhales] …and I said, "Okay, someone needs to find his mom."
translation.es: Llamé a Shayna y le dije: "Alguien tiene que encontrar a su mamá".

translation.en: I was like, "Let me give it a shot."
translation.es: Y yo respondí: "Claro, lo intentaré".

translation.en: I wanted to do a DNA test.
translation.es: Quería hacer una prueba de ADN,

translation.en: The initial jail he was in, though, was very rough,
translation.es: pero la primera cárcel en la que estuvo era muy estricta

translation.en: and they did not allow outside visitors at all.
translation.es: y no permitía visitas de afuera.

translation.en: But I couldn't let it go.
translation.es: Pero no me di por vencida.

translation.en: I was blasting social media,
translation.es: Hice publicaciones en todas las redes sociales

translation.en: trying to find out if anyone knows something about Anthony,
translation.es: a ver si alguien sabía algo sobre Anthony,

translation.en: but I couldn't find anything.
translation.es: pero no logré encontrar nada.

translation.en: Due to Anthony being a minor,
translation.es: Como Anthony era menor,

translation.en: I knew that none of his information would show up online.
translation.es: sabía que su información no aparecería en línea.

translation.en: So I started looking at Burt pretty hard.
translation.es: Así que puse el foco sobre Burt.

translation.en: I found some criminal records.
translation.es: Encontré antecedentes penales.

translation.en: There were some felonies, some misdemeanors,
translation.es: Algunos delitos graves, otros menores,

translation.en: but they were all assault charges.
translation.es: pero todos eran cargos por violencia.

translation.en: And one of them specifically jumped out to me
translation.es: Y hubo uno que me llamó más la atención,

translation.en: because it said "assault with bodily injury of a family member."
translation.es: decía: "agresión con lesiones físicas a un familiar".

translation.en: And that one was done the same year that Anthony was born.
translation.es: Y era del mismo año en el que nació Anthony.

translation.en: I knew that he was born in Texas.
translation.es: Sabía que había nacido en Texas.

translation.en: I have a private investigator friend who drove to Houston looking for more details.
translation.es: Un amigo es investigador privado y fue a Houston a buscar más detalles.

translation.en: He was trying to find out if we could figure out who the victim was in the domestic violence cases.
translation.es: Queríamos averiguar quién era víctima del caso de violencia doméstica.

translation.en: [Elena] Shayna starts looking, and I thought, "How long is this gonna take her?"
translation.es: Shayna empezó a investigar y yo pensaba: "¿Cuánto le llevará?

translation.en: "Because Anthony is locked up in jail
translation.es: Porque Anthony está preso

translation.en: and I don't want him to just kind of get lost in the system."
translation.es: y no quiero que quede olvidado en el sistema.

translation.en: "So I don't want to tell her to hurry up, but I need her to hurry up," and so… [laughs]
translation.es: Así que no quiero presionarla, pero necesito que se apure".

translation.en: [Shayna] I started using this website that I use to find family members.
translation.es: Entonces recurrí al sitio que uso para encontrar familiares.

translation.en: It's like a paid version of WhitePages,
translation.es: Es una versión paga de la guía telefónica

translation.en: but it gives anyone who maybe got mail
translation.es: que lista a las personas que recibieron correo

translation.en: at the same home as them at any given time, as an "associate."
translation.es: en la misma dirección en un momento dado, como un "socio".

translation.en: I wanted to see if I could find any associates from Texas
translation.es: Quería ver si podía encontrar estas relaciones en Texas,

translation.en: since I knew Anthony was born there.
translation.es: porque es donde nació Anthony.

translation.en: And I found this girl
translation.es: Y encontré a una chica

translation.en: associated with Burt.
translation.es: vinculada a Burt.

translation.en: And the way she spells her name, "Netasha," is very unique.
translation.es: Y la forma en que escribe su nombre, Natasha, es muy particular.

translation.en: She has an "e" in the beginning of it instead of an "a."
translation.es: Lleva una "e" al principio, en lugar de una "a".

translation.en: So it's "N-E-T-A-S-H-A."
translation.es: Es "Netasha".

translation.en: So it wasn't hard to just find her on Facebook.
translation.es: Así que no fue difícil encontrarla en Facebook.

translation.en: [Elena] She sent me a picture and said, "Do you think this could be his sister?"
translation.es: Me envió una foto y me preguntó: "¿Crees que sea su hermana?".

translation.en: And I was like,
translation.es: Y me quedé…

translation.en: "Oh, my gosh, that's absolutely his sister."
translation.es: "¡Por Dios! Definitivamente es su hermana".

translation.en: [Shayna] I sent her a Facebook message that day.
translation.es: Le envié un mensaje de Facebook ese día,

translation.en: But the way Facebook works,
translation.es: pero, por cómo es Facebook,

translation.en: is because we weren't friends, it went into the secret mailbox
translation.es: como no éramos amigas, fue a parar a un buzón oculto

translation.en: that she didn't see for a few days.
translation.es: que recién vio días más tarde.

translation.en: After reading my message, Netasha immediately got with her mom and gave me a call.
translation.es: Después de leer mi mensaje, Natasha habló con su mamá y me llamaron.

translation.en: And I happened to be on the phone with Elena, so I actually conference-called them in.
translation.es: Yo justo estaba al teléfono con Elena, así que las incluí en la llamada.

translation.en: We told them together that we were looking to help Anthony.
translation.es: Las dos les dijimos que queríamos ayudar a Anthony.

translation.en: They actually called him AJ at first.
translation.es: Ellas, al principio, le decían AJ.

translation.en: Neither of us knew him by that nickname,
translation.es: Nosotras no lo conocíamos por ese apodo,

translation.en: so we were a little confused at first.
translation.es: así que estábamos algo confundidas.

translation.en: I started digging for the story,
translation.es: Comencé a querer saber más sobre la historia,

translation.en: and immediately they sent me the missing poster.
translation.es: e inmediatamente me enviaron el cartel de desaparecido.

translation.en: He was legitimately a missing child, with the poster and everything.
translation.es: Era un niño desaparecido, con el cartel y todo.

translation.en: That shocked me.
translation.es: Eso me dejó pasmada.

translation.en: As soon as I heard that, chills go up my spine.
translation.es: En cuanto oí eso, me quedé helada.

translation.en: We start with a major development in the case.
translation.es: Empezamos con un gran giro en el caso.

translation.en: Just weeks after Anthony Templet
translation.es: Semanas después de que Anthony Templet

translation.en: is accused of shooting and killing his father,
translation.es: sea acusado de matar a su padre,

translation.en: we learned he may have been snatched from his home more than a decade ago.
translation.es: descubrimos que fue secuestrado de su casa hace más de una década.

translation.en: Part of the puzzle is this flier that actually surfaced from over a decade ago,
translation.es: Parte del rompecabezas es este volante que apareció hace más de una década,

translation.en: claiming Templet was taken from his own home by his own father.
translation.es: que dice que su propio padre lo secuestró de su propia casa.

translation.en: [Jarrett] There was all these questions in my head about what could have happened.
translation.es: Mi cabeza estaba llena de preguntas sobre lo que pudo haber pasado.

translation.en: Had the kid been caged in his home?
translation.es: ¿Había estado encerrado?

translation.en: Now, I've since learned just how bad it was.
translation.es: Recién en ese momento entendí lo terrible que era.
